text: Stories About Lenin () is a 1957 Soviet drama movie directed by Sergei Yutkevich.Медведев поздравил с 80-летием Юрия НазароваРАССКАЗЫ О ЛЕНИНЕ It stars Maksim Shtraukh, Maria Pastukhova, and Anna Lisyanskaya. == Actors == * Maksim Shtraukh as Vladimir Lenin * Maria Pastukhova as Nadezhda Krupskaya * Anna Lisyanskaya as Maria Ilyinichna Ulyanova * Oleg Yefremov as Felix Dzerzhinsky * Aleksandr Kutepov as Yakov Sverdlov * Vsevolod Sanayev as Nikolai Yemelyanov == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:Russian war movies Category:1957 drama movies Category:1957 war movies Category:Movies directed by Sergei Yutkevich Category:Movies set in the 1910s Category:Movies set in the 1920s Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Soviet war movies
title: Stories About Lenin
